QuestData.Title: Gestating Genesaur
QuestData.Description: This is bad. A genesaur is starting to sprout right here in the bloom.$b$bThis is the first reported case of a genesaur being born in draenor in over three hundred years.$b$bNo wonder the botani have been acting so crazy. They are bringing back bodies to fertilize that monstrosity.$b$bWe have to kill it before it gets any larger. Once fully grown there is no stopping that beast.
QuestData.CompletionText: I never thought I would see a genesaur in my lifetime.
QuestData.RewardText: That was close.$b$bIf that genesaur would have grown any larger we would have needed an army to destroy it.$b$bThank you for all your help.
